definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I don't want anyone with factories or prostitutes or concubines.
sentences.chinese: 我不找資本家，也不要逛窯子或有小老婆的人。

sentences.english: She is in order to pay for his father to himself into the kiln.
sentences.chinese: 她是爲了給自己父親還債自己把自己賣進窯子的。

sentences.english: He, even if not first-run Duyao, the Liangzhong drink wine, comfortable comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 他，即使先不跑土窯子，也該喝兩盅酒，自在自在。
